localised_description.last_approved_text: Nurgle's Champions spread their pestilence to your legions. Those that survive such a blessing will be 'gifted'.

incidents.localised_description: Nurgle's Champions spread their pestilence to your legions. Those that survive such a blessing will be 'gifted'.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Ruinous Powers demand a large sacrifice of blood. The altars must be drenched in it or we will suffer a loss of favour!

incidents.localised_description: The Ruinous Powers demand a large sacrifice of blood. The altars must be drenched in it or we will suffer a loss of favour!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The enemy has unearthed and purged one of our cults. We will recover, but the coven lost some potential influencers that should have served our cause for years to come.

incidents.localised_description: The enemy has unearthed and purged one of our cults. We will recover, but the coven lost some potential influencers that should have served our cause for years to come.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Champions of the Dark Gods are many; one comes to us, ready to serve so he may be rewarded and elevated. Use him, but make sure he knows his place, and the consequences of failure.

incidents.localised_description: The Champions of the Dark Gods are many; one comes to us, ready to serve so he may be rewarded and elevated. Use him, but make sure he knows his place, and the consequences of failure.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Gods look upon the hordes and are pleased… such is the capricious nature of Chaos.

incidents.localised_description: The Gods look upon the hordes and are pleased… such is the capricious nature of Chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Gods look upon the hordes and are angry… such is the fickle power of Chaos.

incidents.localised_description: The Gods look upon the hordes and are angry… such is the fickle power of Chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Khorne is not always a bloodthirsty killer, he occasionally recognises and respects martial prowess in his opponents. He sees it on one of our foes.

incidents.localised_description: Khorne is not always a bloodthirsty killer, he occasionally recognises and respects martial prowess in his opponents. He sees it on one of our foes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: War has broken out between rival tribes of the horde. An example must be made to ensure the Marauders will only fight what our Master's desire.

incidents.localised_description: War has broken out between rival tribes of the horde. An example must be made to ensure the Marauders will only fight what our Master's desire.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A deadly spell has been unleashed onto the world, sending the Chaos Sorcerer and any in his immediate vicinity back into the Realm of Chaos.

incidents.localised_description: A deadly spell has been unleashed onto the world, sending the Chaos Sorcerer and any in his immediate vicinity back into the Realm of Chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While the Gods seem happy with the strength of our sword arms, they sense weakness should we confront an arcane foe. They have sent us a Chaos Sorcerer - ensure he does our bidding, and not the other way around!

incidents.localised_description: While the Gods seem happy with the strength of our sword arms, they sense weakness should we confront an arcane foe. They have sent us a Chaos Sorcerer - ensure he does our bidding, and not the other way around!

localised_description.last_approved_text: In preparation for the slaughter to come, Tzeentch has favoured one of our Champions with a gift.

incidents.localised_description: In preparation for the slaughter to come, Tzeentch has favoured one of our Champions with a gift.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Led by Warrior Priests of Sigmar, and with the blessing of Volkmar the Grim, a force of men under the banner of the Twin-Tailed Comet marches north to engage our servants. Fools!

incidents.localised_description: Led by Warrior Priests of Sigmar, and with the blessing of Volkmar the Grim, a force of men under the banner of the Twin-Tailed Comet marches north to engage our servants. Fools!

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of the legendary harems of Slaanesh has been discovered. Your army may be some time…

incidents.localised_description: One of the legendary harems of Slaanesh has been discovered. Your army may be some time…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Grandfather Nurgle has taken an interest in our exploits - he has been generous with his blessings.

incidents.localised_description: Grandfather Nurgle has taken an interest in our exploits - he has been generous with his blessings.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The grim skull-adorned temples that dot the land grow restless with power. We should use this event to our advantage!

incidents.localised_description: The grim skull-adorned temples that dot the land grow restless with power. We should use this event to our advantage!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A plot of the Great Changer has come to fruition, the seeds of which were sown centuries ago. This will aid our cause.

incidents.localised_description: A plot of the Great Changer has come to fruition, the seeds of which were sown centuries ago. This will aid our cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As an almighty storm darkens the skies, the Shaggoths and their kin are roused and ready to honour their ancient pact with the Chaos Gods.

incidents.localised_description: As an almighty storm darkens the skies, the Shaggoths and their kin are roused and ready to honour their ancient pact with the Chaos Gods.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As dawn breaks, and our followers rouse from their dwindling campfires, they discover many of their fellow tribesmen have been turned to mewling spawn. It is a blessing of the Dark Powers!

incidents.localised_description: As dawn breaks, and our followers rouse from their dwindling campfires, they discover many of their fellow tribesmen have been turned to mewling spawn. It is a blessing of the Dark Powers!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A terrible nexus of vortices sets down and ravages through the tribes - the Gods are angry!

incidents.localised_description: A terrible nexus of vortices sets down and ravages through the tribes - the Gods are angry!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The favour of the Chaos Gods is fickle. No Lord or even the Everchosen remain in the eyes of the Dark Powers forever. There are always others who aspire to take your place, and they plot and scheme to overthrow you at every opportunity!

incidents.localised_description: The favour of the Chaos Gods is fickle. No Lord or even the Everchosen remain in the eyes of the Dark Powers forever. There are always others who aspire to take your place, and they plot and scheme to overthrow you at every opportunity!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Many conflicts are won or lost on the strength of the first, vicious charge. Men are sent flying from the battlefield, often in pieces, even before the savagery of melee begins. A well-timed charge shatters enemy morale, as well as bodies. Blood and sweat may coat the victors, but victory is always painted in colours such as these. Those at the head of the charge seek ever greater thrills, ever more bloodshed. As the battles become bigger, the body count grows higher and the trickles of blood become ever-flowing rivers of red.

incidents.localised_description: Many conflicts are won or lost on the strength of the first, vicious charge. Men are sent flying from the battlefield, often in pieces, even before the savagery of melee begins. A well-timed charge shatters enemy morale, as well as bodies. Blood and sweat may coat the victors, but victory is always painted in colours such as these. Those at the head of the charge seek ever greater thrills, ever more bloodshed. As the battles become bigger, the body count grows higher and the trickles of blood become ever-flowing rivers of red.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The world yields to those who master the Winds of Magic. Great bolts from the heavens scour souls from bodies, whilst raging torrents of fire rend the very flesh from bone. Magic can rip enemies into a dozen pieces or leave nothing but an ugly bloodstain where once they stood. The power granted by the cataclysm, many eons ago, can be harnessed now to bring ruin and destruction upon our enemies. All those who feel the pull of Magic feel it grow as the world festers under Chaos’ Ruinous gaze; their need to ravage grows stronger and stronger by the hour.

incidents.localised_description: The world yields to those who master the Winds of Magic. Great bolts from the heavens scour souls from bodies, whilst raging torrents of fire rend the very flesh from bone. Magic can rip enemies into a dozen pieces or leave nothing but an ugly bloodstain where once they stood. The power granted by the cataclysm, many eons ago, can be harnessed now to bring ruin and destruction upon our enemies. All those who feel the pull of Magic feel it grow as the world festers under Chaos’ Ruinous gaze; their need to ravage grows stronger and stronger by the hour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Battle is a blood-soaked affair. Limbs severed, bones exposed; men left for dead in the cruor-soaked fields amongst scores of fallen friends and enemies. Strong weapons, forged with time, sweat and expertise, mark the difference between victory and defeat. A good sword cuts clean through bone, severing heads and limbs, where lesser weapons will merely maim. As instability grows across the world, so too does man’s bloodlust and his desire for war and carnage on an ever-grander scale.

incidents.localised_description: Battle is a blood-soaked affair. Limbs severed, bones exposed; men left for dead in the cruor-soaked fields amongst scores of fallen friends and enemies. Strong weapons, forged with time, sweat and expertise, mark the difference between victory and defeat. A good sword cuts clean through bone, severing heads and limbs, where lesser weapons will merely maim. As instability grows across the world, so too does man’s bloodlust and his desire for war and carnage on an ever-grander scale.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A brutish Gor - a pretender and nothing more - challenges the chieftain of the brayherd. The young-horn will pay for such folly - their horns adorning banners, and their hearts offered to the Dark Gods.

incidents.localised_description: A brutish Gor - a pretender and nothing more - challenges the chieftain of the brayherd. The young-horn will pay for such folly - their horns adorning banners, and their hearts offered to the Dark Gods.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Striding through the twisted network of beast-paths, the herds happen across an immense and ancient herdstone. Carved with mysterious runes, the stone records many forbidden and lost ways of Cloven Ones.

incidents.localised_description: Striding through the twisted network of beast-paths, the herds happen across an immense and ancient herdstone. Carved with mysterious runes, the stone records many forbidden and lost ways of Cloven Ones.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The ongoing slaughter draws nearby Minotaur tribes. They hunger for blood and battle.

incidents.localised_description: The ongoing slaughter draws nearby Minotaur tribes. They hunger for blood and battle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your herds came across a chapel of the mewling man-scum hammer king and smeared it with filth and the bones of its own priests. Such blasphemy stokes the fear in those who follow such a feeble deity.

incidents.localised_description: Your herds came across a chapel of the mewling man-scum hammer king and smeared it with filth and the bones of its own priests. Such blasphemy stokes the fear in those who follow such a feeble deity.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Gods look upon the warherds and are pleased… Such is the capricious nature of Chaos.

incidents.localised_description: The Gods look upon the warherds and are pleased… Such is the capricious nature of Chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Gods look upon the warherds and are angry… Such is the fickle power of Chaos.

incidents.localised_description: The Gods look upon the warherds and are angry… Such is the fickle power of Chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Granter of Savage Hate sees our warherd for a brief moment, blessing the Gors with an exceptionally ruthless gift.

incidents.localised_description: The Granter of Savage Hate sees our warherd for a brief moment, blessing the Gors with an exceptionally ruthless gift.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Bray-Shaman is cast aside while trying to dominate a Cygor. The cloven mage will recover but is wounded for now.

incidents.localised_description: A Bray-Shaman is cast aside while trying to dominate a Cygor. The cloven mage will recover but is wounded for now.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Pleased by the terrible deeds sewn by the bastard sons of Chaos, the Ruinous Powers reward one of their behorned champions with a boon.

incidents.localised_description: Pleased by the terrible deeds sewn by the bastard sons of Chaos, the Ruinous Powers reward one of their behorned champions with a boon.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Granter of Savage Hate demands more slaughter! The Blood God imbues the warherd with a proportion of his rage.

incidents.localised_description: The Granter of Savage Hate demands more slaughter! The Blood God imbues the warherd with a proportion of his rage.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Centigors raid a nearby winery, bringing back barrels of suspicious liquid. The herd gathers and drinks... only to suffer a hellish hangover! No wonder it is only foppish man-filth and the stinking elf-kin that drink such rot!

incidents.localised_description: The Centigors raid a nearby winery, bringing back barrels of suspicious liquid. The herd gathers and drinks... only to suffer a hellish hangover! No wonder it is only foppish man-filth and the stinking elf-kin that drink such rot!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Centigors raid a nearby brewery, bringing back barrels of mannish beer. The herd gathers to slake their thirst.

incidents.localised_description: The Centigors raid a nearby brewery, bringing back barrels of mannish beer. The herd gathers to slake their thirst.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A black-hobbed crow flies across the sky. In its wake come the beasts - reptiles, mewling cats, frenzied cattle, boars and others driven mad by something they have witnessed deep in the forest. The Famine-Fiend stalks the land, emerging from the woods to leaving nothing but barren wastes and withered crops in his wake - for that is Slugtongue's curse..

incidents.localised_description: A black-hobbed crow flies across the sky. In its wake come the beasts - reptiles, mewling cats, frenzied cattle, boars and others driven mad by something they have witnessed deep in the forest. The Famine-Fiend stalks the land, emerging from the woods to leaving nothing but barren wastes and withered crops in his wake - for that is Slugtongue's curse..

localised_description.last_approved_text: Mankind has fallen. Their civilisation has been crushed; stamped under hoof and shattered. The Gods will be pleased, for their children have done well, but what now for the Cloven Ones? There is still much to do. While mankind’s sovereigns have been slaughtered and their champion’s corpses tossed on a raging pyre, the remnants of this pitiful race still live. It is decreed: all traces of man, and his limp allies, should be despoiled. Take the blood-spattered Banner of the Fallen Kings - a glorious reminder of our victory - and finish the cull!

incidents.localised_description: Mankind has fallen. Their civilisation has been crushed; stamped under hoof and shattered. The Gods will be pleased, for their children have done well, but what now for the Cloven Ones? There is still much to do. While mankind’s sovereigns have been slaughtered and their champion’s corpses tossed on a raging pyre, the remnants of this pitiful race still live. It is decreed: all traces of man, and his limp allies, should be despoiled. Take the blood-spattered Banner of the Fallen Kings - a glorious reminder of our victory - and finish the cull!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The harbinger comes; storms wrack the forests in its wake. The Herdstones glow with dread and the Winds of Magic grow strong.

incidents.localised_description: The harbinger comes; storms wrack the forests in its wake. The Herdstones glow with dread and the Winds of Magic grow strong.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The brayherds gather around the herdstone in an orgy of bloody greed - feasting on captives and the weaker runts of the herd. The Gors will be sated and healthy for some time.

incidents.localised_description: The brayherds gather around the herdstone in an orgy of bloody greed - feasting on captives and the weaker runts of the herd. The Gors will be sated and healthy for some time.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Giants do not make common cause with the brayherds, but if the titans are wandering close by, they join in the slaughter - tempted by snacking on Ungor!

incidents.localised_description: Giants do not make common cause with the brayherds, but if the titans are wandering close by, they join in the slaughter - tempted by snacking on Ungor!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Carroburg falls, Khazrak! The pathetic man-filth flee before you, weeping their crimson heraldry across the rubble of their ruined cities. This is the first defeat of many that the defenders of Middenland will taste, yet stiffer challenges await as you progress. All of Middenland will rise, desperate and worthless, to try and stop your brutal advance. The herd moves all the same, Khazrak - no weak fleshling can stand in your way!

incidents.localised_description: Carroburg falls, Khazrak! The pathetic man-filth flee before you, weeping their crimson heraldry across the rubble of their ruined cities. All of Middenland will rise, desperate and worthless, to try and stop your brutal advance. The herd moves all the same, Khazrak - no weak fleshling can stand in your way!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Wolves at last cease their pitiful barking. If Ulric is truly as they say he is, then he shall look upon his pathetic worshippers with disgust as they break before the warherd. There are no gods but the Ruinous Powers, justly and rightly capricious. Only Middenheim remains now, Khazrak. Todbringer waits in his capital - its brutal and swift destruction will bring all of Middenland to its knees, and to your unflinching fury!

If Ulric is truly as they say he is, then he shall look upon his pathetic worshippers with disgust as they break before the warherd. There are no gods but the Ruinous Powers, justly and rightly capricious. Only Middenheim remains now, Khazrak. Todbringer waits in his capital - its brutal and swift destruction will bring all of Middenland to its knees, and to your unflinching fury!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The desperation of man is a potent stench, and it is most powerful here. Middenland, knowing that its doom approaches, has beseeched its allies Hochland to come to its aid. Though they bleed from their forests and towns to wage war on the herd, it is but a useless gesture. Drench the forests in Hochland's foul colours - let nothing stand between you and vengeance!

Middenland, knowing that its doom approaches, has beseeched its allies Hochland to come to its aid. Though they bleed from their forests and towns to wage war on the herd, it is but a useless gesture. Drench the forests in Hochland's foul colours - let nothing stand between you and vengeance!

Middenland, knowing that its doom approaches, has beseeched its allies Hochland to come to its aid. Though they bleed from their forests and towns to wage war on the herd, it is but a useless gesture. Drench the forests in Hochland's foul colours - let nothing stand between you and vengeance!

Middenland, knowing that its doom approaches, has beseeched its allies Hochland to come to its aid. Though they bleed from their forests and towns to wage war on the herd, it is but a useless gesture. Drench the forests in Hochland's foul colours - let nothing stand between you and vengeance!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Back when Vlad first held Castle Drakenhof - having taken it from the mad count, Otto von Drak - he would hold the most notorious parties. Guests would come in costume with their faces hidden behind bejewelled masks. Music and dancing earlier in the evening would give way to darker and carnal pursuits later on.\n\nVlad hosts another masqued ball, the first for centuries, where Vampires and willing mortal nobles will receive a smidgen of power in return for their eternal servitude. It is a deal that can only favour the first von Carstein...

incidents.localised_description: Back when Vlad first held Castle Drakenhof - having taken it from the mad count, Otto von Drak - he would hold the most notorious parties. Guests would come in costume with their faces hidden behind bejewelled masks. Music and dancing earlier in the evening would give way to darker and carnal pursuits later on.\n\nVlad hosts another masqued ball, the first for centuries, where Vampires and willing mortal nobles will receive a smidgen of power in return for their eternal servitude. It is a deal that can only favour the first von Carstein...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The spirits that refuse to leave the mortal plane remain in the forest, fusing with living trees to become Treemen. These warriors are mighty and terrifying, yet each one that leaves the forest to fight weakens it, if only temporarily.

incidents.localised_description: The spirits that refuse to leave the mortal plane remain in the forest, fusing with living trees to become Treemen. These warriors are mighty and terrifying, yet each one that leaves the forest to fight weakens it, if only temporarily.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The forest provides for those who do it great service. The Lords and Ladies of the realms of Athel Loren are chosen nobility, provided for greatly by the spirits of the forest. Those who work in more insalubrious capacities are still offered succour by the woods, for their all-the-same important service to the realm.

incidents.localised_description: The forest provides for those who do it great service. The Lords and Ladies of the realms of Athel Loren are chosen nobility, provided for greatly by the spirits of the forest. Those who work in more insalubrious capacities are still offered succour by the woods, for their all-the-same important service to the realm.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Wood Elves of the Moonspring Glades, ever interested in unearthing truths about their ancestry, have struck upon a trove of information, buried deep beneath the forest. The scriptures they have uncovered seem to date all the way back to the Great Voyage, when the Elves travelled from Ulthuan and established themselves in Athel Loren. The information contained therein will help shape the future of all Asrai...

incidents.localised_description: The Wood Elves of the Moonspring Glades, ever interested in unearthing truths about their ancestry, have struck upon a trove of information, buried deep beneath the forest. The scriptures they have uncovered seem to date all the way back to the Great Voyage, when the Elves travelled from Ulthuan and established themselves in Athel Loren. The information contained therein will help shape the future of all Asrai...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Eternal Realms of Athel Loren are led by great Lords and Ladies, who in turn feel a responsibility for their Elven subjects. Their spirits, and the spirits of the forest, must be kept appeased. And so it is they have thrown great and lavish masques, across the realms, to better bring together the forest and the Asrai. Of course, such ventures are never, ever cheap...

incidents.localised_description: The Eternal Realms of Athel Loren are led by great Lords and Ladies, who in turn feel a responsibility for their Elven subjects. Their spirits, and the spirits of the forest, must be kept appeased. And so it is they have thrown great and lavish masques, across the realms, to better bring together the forest and the Asrai. Of course, such ventures are never, ever cheap...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The greatest shock for the Asrai was the discovery that they were not alone in the forests - the Beastmen hordes had made squalid dens amongst the trees. For centuries the two have fought for ownership of the woods. Long have they fought, with not even the climactic Battle of Anguish enough to cease the conflict...

incidents.localised_description: The greatest shock for the Asrai was the discovery that they were not alone in the forests - the Beastmen hordes had made squalid dens amongst the trees. For centuries the two have fought for ownership of the woods. Long have they fought, with not even the climactic Battle of Anguish enough to cease the conflict...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dreaming Woods, Athel Caiellin, is a forbidden place ruled by the worshippers of Slaanesh. To travel there is to flirt with madness and temptation, and those that emerge are either wracked by lunacy, or forged by the crucible of their experiences. This one has walked through the fires of insanity, and found an ethereal strength on the other side...

incidents.localised_description: The Dreaming Woods, Athel Caiellin, is a forbidden place ruled by the worshippers of Slaanesh. To travel there is to flirt with madness and temptation, and those that emerge are either wracked by lunacy, or forged by the crucible of their experiences. This one has walked through the fires of insanity, and found an ethereal strength on the other side...

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is one domain of Athel Loren regarded as the home of the smiths; the Forge of Starlight. Beneath these noisome and industrious boughs, the undisputed master armourers ply their craft with unfaltering excellence. The weapons created here not only provide a literal edge in battle, but improve the morale of those wielding them simply by their knowing where they came from.

incidents.localised_description: There is one domain of Athel Loren regarded as the home of the smiths; the Forge of Starlight. Beneath these noisome and industrious boughs, the undisputed master armourers ply their craft with unfaltering excellence. The weapons created here not only provide a literal edge in battle, but improve the morale of those wielding them simply by their knowing where they came from.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Lords and Ladies of Athel Loren gather every so often to discuss and determine the future of the Asrai. Their word, once the debate is concluded, is proclaimed throughout the forests and enacted immediately. At this moment, they have decided that more funds are required if Athel Loren is to prosper...

incidents.localised_description: The Lords and Ladies of Athel Loren gather every so often to discuss and determine the future of the Asrai. Their word, once the debate is concluded, is proclaimed throughout the forests and enacted immediately. At this moment, they have decided that more funds are required if Athel Loren is to prosper...

localised_description.last_approved_text: As Spring finally bursts forth across Athel Loren, the deep chills of Winter retreat and life is given free reign once more. The forests bloom, verdant and lively. The boughs spread, the vines grow, and life explodes from the Deepwood once more…

incidents.localised_description: As Spring finally bursts forth across Athel Loren, the deep chills of Winter retreat and life is given free reign once more. The forests bloom, verdant and lively. The boughs spread, the vines grow, and life explodes from the Deepwood once more…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The chill of Winter has passed, and the dew-soaked branches of Spring have begun to blossom. The Asrai allow themselves a moment of rest within Athel Loren. As the forest regenerates, so too do the Wood Elves…

incidents.localised_description: The chill of Winter has passed, and the dew-soaked branches of Spring have begun to blossom. The Asrai allow themselves a moment of rest within Athel Loren. As the forest regenerates, so too do the Wood Elves…

localised_description.last_approved_text: At the height of the season of growth, the forests of Athel Loren push rebelliously past the waystone fence and into the tracts of heath and scrub that border the mystical woods. Such boundless enthusiasm is admirable, but equilibrium must be maintained. All Asrai are predisposed in the management of the forest; things may move a little slower until Athel Loren is... curtailed.

incidents.localised_description: At the height of the season of growth, the forests of Athel Loren push rebelliously past the waystone fence and into the tracts of heath and scrub that border the mystical woods. Such boundless enthusiasm is admirable, but equilibrium must be maintained. All Asrai are predisposed in the management of the forest; things may move a little slower until Athel Loren is... curtailed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Against the boundaries of the waystone fence, interlopers have come with their weapons of war. They brought destruction and vandalism to Athel Loren, before retreating like craven cowards when the forest stirred. Athel Loren demands vengeance, and would have you exact it.

incidents.localised_description: Against the boundaries of the waystone fence, interlopers have come with their weapons of war. They brought destruction and vandalism to Athel Loren, before retreating like craven cowards when the forest stirred. Athel Loren demands vengeance, and would have you exact it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those Waywatchers that become atuned to the forest's every motion soon find they prefer the company of the trees to their own kindred. These 'Waystalkers' are the most expert of hunters, singularly dedicated to the whims of Athel Loren…

incidents.localised_description: Those Waywatchers that become atuned to the forest's every motion soon find they prefer the company of the trees to their own kindred. These 'Waystalkers' are the most expert of hunters, singularly dedicated to the whims of Athel Loren…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Branchwraiths are no friends to the Asrai, and so openly plot against them when given the opportunity. However, greater evils still stalk amongst the trees; if the Branchwraiths are to wreak their havoc upon the woods, they must first be purged.

incidents.localised_description: The Branchwraiths are no friends to the Asrai, and so openly plot against them when given the opportunity. However, greater evils still stalk amongst the trees; if the Branchwraiths are to wreak their havoc upon the woods, they must first be purged.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With Belegar's forces in control of the area, an extensive search is carried out. Urk trails are quickly found that lead to previously hidden entrances to the Underway. Such portals are new, and far beyond the skills of the Greenskins to create, but are undoubtedly in use by their sworn enemies. Belegar doesn't like this deduction at all - it suggests coercion or, at the worst, even treason. Either fate is a great sin in the eyes of the Ancestors.

incidents.localised_description: With Belegar's forces in control of the area, an extensive search is carried out. Urk trails are quickly found that lead to previously hidden entrances to the Underway. Such portals are new, and far beyond the skills of the Greenskins to create, but are undoubtedly in use by their sworn enemies. Belegar doesn't like this deduction at all - it suggests coercion or, at the worst, even treason. Either fate is a great sin in the eyes of the Ancestors.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Goblin eagerly accepts the bribe and details where the false prophet is currently hidden. Wurrzag listens and then hands over the reward. The gobbo’s eyes light up at seeing all the booty. Such elation is short-lived though, as Wurrzag loudly proclaims to his followers that any who knew this information but withheld it for gain are clearly enemies of Mork and Gork… That night Wurrzag’s most fervent followers eat roasted, bribed gobbo...

incidents.localised_description: A Goblin eagerly accepts the bribe and details where the false prophet is currently hidden. Wurrzag listens and then hands over the reward. The gobbo’s eyes light up at seeing all the booty. Such elation is short-lived though, as Wurrzag loudly proclaims to his followers that any who knew this information but withheld it for gain are clearly enemies of Mork and Gork… That night Wurrzag’s most fervent followers eat roasted, bribed gobbo...

localised_description.last_approved_text: This hunting season has been one of uncommonly high volume - nobles simply cannot get enough of the game. Whilst this has kept the aristocracy appeased, farms and villages have felt the pinch.

incidents.localised_description: This hunting season has been one of uncommonly high volume - nobles simply cannot get enough of the game. Whilst this has kept the aristocracy appeased, farms and villages have felt the pinch.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Although they tried to hide it, the peasants of a nearby village were discovered with traces of a new, foul pox. To keep it from spreading, the entire village was swiftly burned to cinders; the potential crisis has been averted.

incidents.localised_description: Although they tried to hide it, the peasants of a nearby village were discovered with traces of a new, foul pox. To keep it from spreading, the entire village was swiftly burned to cinders; the potential crisis has been averted.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To impress upon visiting aristocrats to our fair cities, our merchants showered lavish products upon them at discounted prices. Although this affected their profits, the quality of their goods has been praised the world over.

incidents.localised_description: To impress upon visiting aristocrats to our fair cities, our merchants showered lavish products upon them at discounted prices. Although this affected their profits, the quality of their goods has been praised the world over.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Churches and chapels across the realm are reporting healthy numbers of worshippers. Those close to the Enchantress say that she is pleased; if so, then surely the Lady herself is also?

incidents.localised_description: Churches and chapels across the realm are reporting healthy numbers of worshippers. Those close to the Enchantress say that she is pleased; if so, then surely the Lady herself is also?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The most recent tourney was heralded as a great success; violence, bloodshed and feasting galore! It has been many days, yet people are still abuzz at the grandeur of it all. Truly, Bretonnia is blessed.

incidents.localised_description: The most recent tourney was heralded as a great success; violence, bloodshed and feasting galore! It has been many days, yet people are still abuzz at the grandeur of it all. Truly, Bretonnia is blessed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The noblemen continually have innovative and expansive ideas for how to improve and grow our cities; their wondrous minds give birth to a revolution in construction!

incidents.localised_description: The noblemen continually have innovative and expansive ideas for how to improve and grow our cities; their wondrous minds give birth to a revolution in construction!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Another season, another feast. No other Kingdom in the Old World can lay claim to banquets so great. Such was the magnificence, that there is much left over to give to our artisans in gratitude for their endless hard work.

incidents.localised_description: Another season, another feast. No other Kingdom in the Old World can lay claim to banquets so great. Such was the magnificence, that there is much left over to give to our artisans in gratitude for their endless hard work.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When a Knight cheats at a tournament, it demeans not only himself, but the very ideals of a chivalric Bretonnia. One of our most heralded Knights has been caught locking himself to his horse, preventing his dismount in the joust. Truly, he brings shame upon us all.

incidents.localised_description: When a Knight cheats at a tournament, it demeans not only himself, but the very ideals of a chivalric Bretonnia. One of our most heralded Knights has been caught locking himself to his horse, preventing his dismount in the joust. Truly, he brings shame upon us all.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is no denying that the Knight is the pinnacle of the chivalric ideal, but arrogance must never get the better of honour. Some Knights, unfortunately, enjoy basking in their own glory a little too much…

incidents.localised_description: There is no denying that the Knight is the pinnacle of the chivalric ideal, but arrogance must never get the better of honour. Some Knights, unfortunately, enjoy basking in their own glory a little too much…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The farmland peasants have been growing restless and rowdy, complaining about their lot in life. They spoke the Vow of Duty, did they not? Then their quarrelsome tone is nothing less than blasphemy.

incidents.localised_description: The farmland peasants have been growing restless and rowdy, complaining about their lot in life. They spoke the Vow of Duty, did they not? Then their quarrelsome tone is nothing less than blasphemy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Many hours' worth of toil, and many coffers' worth of coin have been poured into the restoration of the Grail Monastery. Now, returned to its former glory, nobles have rushed to send their children there to learn from Bretonnia's most prestigious academics.

incidents.localised_description: Many hours' worth of toil, and many coffers' worth of coin have been poured into the restoration of the Grail Monastery. Now, returned to its former glory, nobles have rushed to send their children there to learn from Bretonnia's most prestigious academics.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A churlish peasant had the snivelling gall to throw a noble from his horse, in retaliation for an apparent 'slight' against his family. He has, naturally, been hanged by the neck until dead, so that nobody else thinks to act rebelliously.

incidents.localised_description: A churlish peasant had the snivelling gall to throw a noble from his horse, in retaliation for an apparent 'slight' against his family. He has, naturally, been hanged by the neck until dead, so that nobody else thinks to act rebelliously.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your people live in fear, for evil stalks fair Bretonnia. The Greenskins that infest the mountains and forests harass and raid the surrounding villages with ever-greater violence. Now they mass in the hills the people fear a greater incursion – control is decreasing across the land as a result. Hold out, if you think the Kingdom robust enough – in the hope that they tire and skulk back to their hideouts – or lead a force to destroy their settlements, end their attacks and wipe them out for good.

incidents.localised_description: Your people live in fear, for evil stalks fair Bretonnia. The Greenskins that infest the mountains and forests harass and raid the surrounding villages with ever-greater violence. Now they mass in the hills the people fear a greater incursion – control is decreasing across the land as a result. Hold out, if you think the Kingdom robust enough – in the hope that they tire and skulk back to their hideouts – or lead a force to destroy their settlements, end their attacks and wipe them out for good.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Alberic of Bordeleaux has dreamed of a life spent questing, yet when his father died he was thrust unexpectedly into the Dukedom and has never been able to relinquish the awesome responsibility bestowed upon him. Yet opportunity has arisen at last in the form of dire tidings; the ancestral tomb of the Bordeleaux Dukes has been ransacked and amongst the items stolen is the Trident of Manann, said to be descended from the god of the sea himself. Although horrified, Alberic is also instilled with an excitement. He knows he must rescue the relic and restore safety to the Dukedom, and so must investigate personally...

incidents.localised_description: Alberic of Bordeleaux has dreamed of a life spent questing, yet when his father died he was thrust unexpectedly into the Dukedom and has never been able to relinquish the awesome responsibility bestowed upon him. Yet opportunity has arisen at last in the form of dire tidings; the ancestral tomb of the Bordeleaux Dukes has been ransacked and amongst the items stolen is the Trident of Manann, said to be descended from the god of the sea himself. Although horrified, Alberic is also instilled with an excitement. He knows he must rescue the relic and restore safety to the Dukedom, and so must investigate personally...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Fay Enchantress allows herself a brief, fleeting moment of relief - two of the three rituals are accomplished, and the two most difficult rituals at that. The third is simple - a great final evocation, along with the placement of the Chalice, at the Grand Chapel of Couronne. With its completion, all three locations are in synchronicity, and the ritual begins in earnest.\n\nBefore long, the change becomes apparent. The Winds of Magic shift and grow, becoming powerful enough to be observed. Howling just beyond hearing, they cannot be heard, but can be perceived. The Chalice of Potions glows with a brighter aura, and all those who see it know its power. The Fay Enchantress wonders if this will be enough...

incidents.localised_description: The Fay Enchantress allows herself a brief, fleeting moment of relief - two of the three rituals are accomplished, and the two most difficult rituals at that. The third is simple - a great final evocation, along with the placement of the Chalice, at the Grand Chapel of Couronne. With its completion, all three locations are in synchronicity, and the ritual begins in earnest.\n\nBefore long, the change becomes apparent. The Winds of Magic shift and grow, becoming powerful enough to be observed. Howling just beyond hearing, they cannot be heard, but can be perceived. The Chalice of Potions glows with a brighter aura, and all those who see it know its power. The Fay Enchantress wonders if this will be enough...

localised_description.last_approved_text: A mist rolls down from the mountains covering the lands of Bretonnia. The origin of this dense effluvium is as murky as the mist itself; all the people of Bretonnia know is that what was not there before is there now, obfuscating and obscuring all. Yet more troubling than the mist itself is what lies beyond - the shouting and smashing of the Greenskin hordes haunt the dreams of the peasants, who fear they may be next. The people panic, refusing to leave their homes, lest they be next victims of the slavering, rampaging Orcish host.

incidents.localised_description: A mist rolls down from the mountains covering the lands of Bretonnia. The origin of this dense effluvium is as murky as the mist itself; all the people of Bretonnia know is that what was not there before is there now, obfuscating and obscuring all. Yet more troubling than the mist itself is what lies beyond - the shouting and smashing of the Greenskin hordes haunt the dreams of the peasants, who fear they may be next. The people panic, refusing to leave their homes, lest they be next victims of the slavering, rampaging Orcish host.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Dwarf is never content to part with gold, but the upgraded workshops will allow this labour to proceed.

incidents.localised_description: A Dwarf is never content to part with gold, but the upgraded workshops will allow this labour to proceed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Sending supplies and treasure to the fugitives secures a treaty of co-operation with them. Thorgrim can now call on their aid should he need it.

incidents.localised_description: Sending supplies and treasure to the fugitives secures a treaty of co-operation with them. Thorgrim can now call on their aid should he need it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Lacking further leads, the Supreme Patriarch Balthasar Gelt offers a bounty for any information which might lead to an explanation.

incidents.localised_description: Lacking further leads, the Supreme Patriarch Balthasar Gelt offers a bounty for any information which might lead to an explanation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It seems that the process of transmutation is dangerously unpredictable. Gelt's experiments triggered an explosion which he barely survived, he is a veteran of such occurrences. However, his first-hand experience of the forces involved gives him an insight into an artefact that may reduce the risk.

incidents.localised_description: It seems that the process of transmutation is dangerously unpredictable. Gelt's experiments triggered an explosion which he barely survived, he is a veteran of such occurrences. However, his first-hand experience of the forces involved gives him an insight into an artefact that may reduce the risk.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With the funds secured, the Emperor orders his factors to secure the necessary rare materials so that the required additions to the astrolabe can be made.

incidents.localised_description: With the funds secured, the Emperor orders his factors to secure the necessary rare materials so that the required additions to the astrolabe can be made.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The expedition was a success, and the dam was breached. Parts of Stirland are flooded!

incidents.localised_description: The expedition was a success, and the dam was breached. Parts of Stirland are flooded!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The populace in one of your settlements is gradually vanishing! On certain nights, whole ghettos or districts are left abandoned - the only clue for the remaining denizens is a triangular symbol daubed on a nearby gate or wall…

incidents.localised_description: The populace in one of your settlements is gradually vanishing! On certain nights, whole ghettos or districts are left abandoned - the only clue for the remaining denizens is a triangular symbol daubed on a nearby gate or wall…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Arcane Fulcrums are terrible, complex and eldritch monoliths whose nature and function have puzzled the finest minds for millennia. Should a magic-user stand at the pinnacle of the one found here then his powers will be greatly enchanced.

incidents.localised_description: Arcane Fulcrums are terrible, complex and eldritch monoliths whose nature and function have puzzled the finest minds for millennia. Should a magic-user stand at the pinnacle of the one found here then his powers will be greatly enchanced.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The herds of Chaos are active. The Beastmen emerge from the forests and raid your more-isolated settlements, bringing ruin and taking captives.

incidents.localised_description: The herds of Chaos are active. The Beastmen emerge from the forests and raid your more-isolated settlements, bringing ruin and taking captives.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The weather in these lands is rarely governed by the seasons, and now a blizzard of icy shards has come scything down from the mountains. Those not prepared will die.

incidents.localised_description: The weather in these lands is rarely governed by the seasons, and now a blizzard of icy shards has come scything down from the mountains. Those not prepared will die.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This world breeds tough men; some of whom can also be bitter, cruel and greedy. They mob together in gangs of brigands to prey upon travellers and traders.

incidents.localised_description: This world breeds tough men; some of whom can also be bitter, cruel and greedy. They mob together in gangs of brigands to prey upon travellers and traders.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The most powerful of all enchantments, known as Cataclysm Spells, can only be cast during or in the wake of a Storm of Magic. Such a destructive spell has been unleashed upon your realm…

incidents.localised_description: The most powerful of all enchantments, known as Cataclysm Spells, can only be cast during or in the wake of a Storm of Magic. Such a destructive spell has been unleashed upon your realm…

localised_description.last_approved_text: A pride of monstrous Chimerae has flown down from the mountain reaches - or displaced by some other foul threat - and are causing havoc amongst the populace. It will be some time before they can be removed!

incidents.localised_description: A pride of monstrous Chimerae has flown down from the mountain reaches - or displaced by some other foul threat - and are causing havoc amongst the populace. It will be some time before they can be removed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Revere the gods for we need their favour. Yet some fools - insurgents or traitors - are destroying shrines. Doing so risks incurring a holy wrath on us all.

incidents.localised_description: Revere the gods for we need their favour. Yet some fools - insurgents or traitors - are destroying shrines. Doing so risks incurring a holy wrath on us all.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The cruel sun bakes the lands - Stromfels, God of Storms, punishes us. The people grow restless as water and food diminish.

incidents.localised_description: The cruel sun bakes the lands - Stromfels, God of Storms, punishes us. The people grow restless as water and food diminish.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The drought continues. Water has become so scarce it is now worth more than gold or warpstone! Only those with true power are spared this privation.

incidents.localised_description: The drought continues. Water has become so scarce it is now worth more than gold or warpstone! Only those with true power are spared this privation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The gods rage and so the ground shakes. Buildings collapse, statuary fall and our followers die in the rubble or are taken by the dwellers below.

incidents.localised_description: The gods rage and so the ground shakes. Buildings collapse, statuary fall and our followers die in the rubble or are taken by the dwellers below.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Portents of doom cloud this settlement and so many of its inhabitants flee to seek sanctuary - or a change in fortunes - elsewhere.

incidents.localised_description: Portents of doom cloud this settlement and so many of its inhabitants flee to seek sanctuary - or a change in fortunes - elsewhere.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The luring grin of Morrslieb is visible; it dominates the night sky and those who look up at it are said to go insane or driven to murderous rage. Order must be restored.

incidents.localised_description: The luring grin of Morrslieb is visible; it dominates the night sky and those who look up at it are said to go insane or driven to murderous rage. Order must be restored.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Food is scarce. The fetid hand of Nurgle is no doubt involved, causing crops to wither, milk to sour and game to diminish. Another source of sustenance must be found.

incidents.localised_description: Food is scarce. The fetid hand of Nurgle is no doubt involved, causing crops to wither, milk to sour and game to diminish. Another source of sustenance must be found.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your followers praise their leader and pray to the gods for their continuing support. They hold a great feast in your honour.

incidents.localised_description: Your followers praise their leader and pray to the gods for their continuing support. They hold a great feast in your honour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Aqshy's kiss has visited us! The settlement is ablaze! Your followers are flooding the crowded streets, trying to escape a horrible burning death.

incidents.localised_description: Aqshy's kiss has visited us! The settlement is ablaze! Your followers are flooding the crowded streets, trying to escape a horrible burning death.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Mannslieb's orbit strains and the lands flood, causing watery devastation in its wake…

incidents.localised_description: Mannslieb's orbit strains and the lands flood, causing watery devastation in its wake…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The gods of your enemies have directly intervened in our interests. Sewing destruction across our realm, how do we confront a god's wrath?

incidents.localised_description: The gods of your enemies have directly intervened in our interests. Sewing destruction across our realm, how do we confront a god's wrath?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Appease your neighbours or keep hostile ones at bay, for now at least. This will keep our borders stable and allow us to strike at enemies further afield.

incidents.localised_description: Appease your neighbours or keep hostile ones at bay, for now at least. This will keep our borders stable and allow us to strike at enemies further afield.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Good! Distract your people with brutish games. Crowds flock to the fighting pits and arenas to revel in the violence and forget their woes for a time.

incidents.localised_description: Good! Distract your people with brutish games. Crowds flock to the fighting pits and arenas to revel in the violence and forget their woes for a time.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our troops are lost. Whether this is due to some nefarious scheme, Grey Magic enchantment, or simple incompetence is irrelevant - they must retrace their steps and lose time.

incidents.localised_description: Our troops are lost. Whether this is due to some nefarious scheme, Grey Magic enchantment, or simple incompetence is irrelevant - they must retrace their steps and lose time.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A vile disease, birthed by Grandfather Nurgle or one of his foul minions, is sweeping across the population. We can only hope it is one of his less successful concoctions!

incidents.localised_description: A vile disease, birthed by Grandfather Nurgle or one of his foul minions, is sweeping across the population. We can only hope it is one of his less successful concoctions!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The pirate fleets of Sartosa travel far and wide looking for bounty. Now they come across your trade routes and are attacking our ships.

incidents.localised_description: The pirate fleets of Sartosa travel far and wide looking for bounty. Now they come across your trade routes and are attacking our ships.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is a distinct lack of able and willing bodies to join your forces for the ongoing wars. Your press gangers, recruiters or straight-up kidnappers are struggling to find "volunteers".

incidents.localised_description: There is a distinct lack of able and willing bodies to join your forces for the ongoing wars. Your press gangers, recruiters or straight-up kidnappers are struggling to find "volunteers".

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the Blood God knows all too well, war is a meat grinder that constantly requires fresh supplies, which means recruits are not always easy to come by. On this rare occasion, however, there is a glut of bodies, ready and willing to join the fray.

incidents.localised_description: As the Blood God knows all too well, war is a meat grinder that constantly requires fresh supplies, which means recruits are not always easy to come by. On this rare occasion, however, there is a glut of bodies, ready and willing to join the fray.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Everyday more of your followers flock to the city in fear that some terrible peril or enemy horde will murder them without the protection of its walls.

incidents.localised_description: Everyday more of your followers flock to the city in fear that some terrible peril or enemy horde will murder them without the protection of its walls.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The lands are haunted - spirits and ghosts of dead warriors, victims of battles long-since fought - harass and frighten our warriors. This is a bad omen.

incidents.localised_description: The lands are haunted - spirits and ghosts of dead warriors, victims of battles long-since fought - harass and frighten our warriors. This is a bad omen.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A gigantic, floating, sea fortress has been spotted off the coast. And wherever it is seen, coastal settlements have been raided - those not slain outright carried off to some dread fate.

incidents.localised_description: A gigantic, floating, sea fortress has been spotted off the coast. And wherever it is seen, coastal settlements have been raided - those not slain outright carried off to some dread fate.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An arcane tempest scours the land, causing untold damage as well as emboldening unsanctioned sorcerers and rousing monstrous beasts from their lairs.

incidents.localised_description: An arcane tempest scours the land, causing untold damage as well as emboldening unsanctioned sorcerers and rousing monstrous beasts from their lairs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The coming of the End Times can make allies of bitter enemies and strengthen the bonds of existing friendships.

incidents.localised_description: The coming of the End Times can make allies of bitter enemies and strengthen the bonds of existing friendships.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Morrslieb, the dreaded moon of ill omens, hangs mournfully large in the sky. Its sickly green glow spreads across your realm - a portent of death and dismay.

incidents.localised_description: Morrslieb, the dreaded moon of ill omens, hangs mournfully large in the sky. Its sickly green glow spreads across your realm - a portent of death and dismay.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of the great mountains of the Old World has erupted, bringing about a fiery hell. Even the waters boil and everything within proximity to the volcano has been reduced to ashes.

incidents.localised_description: One of the great mountains of the Old World has erupted, bringing about a fiery hell. Even the waters boil and everything within proximity to the volcano has been reduced to ashes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: No matter your dominance of the realms, there will also be creatures that prowl the forests or roam the plains. One of these beasts is attacking and feeding upon your people.

incidents.localised_description: No matter your dominance of the realms, there will also be creatures that prowl the forests or roam the plains. One of these beasts is attacking and feeding upon your people.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like malevolent hail, chunks of Warpstone are falling from the sky in certain parts of your realm. Those that survive the onslaught are far from safe or the mutating effects of the Chaos stuff that now scatters the ground.

incidents.localised_description: Like malevolent hail, chunks of Warpstone are falling from the sky in certain parts of your realm. Those that survive the onslaught are far from safe or the mutating effects of the Chaos stuff that now scatters the ground.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A map has been discovered of the fabled lost Dwarfhold of Karak Zorn. Should Karak Zorn ever be reclaimed for the Karaz Ankor it would be a great triumph in the Age of Reckoning. A large expedition is organised, at great cost and resources.

incidents.localised_description: A map has been discovered of the fabled lost Dwarfhold of Karak Zorn. Should Karak Zorn ever be reclaimed for the Karaz Ankor it would be a great triumph in the Age of Reckoning. A large expedition is organised, at great cost and resources.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Reckoner visits to inspect the Hold's books and ensure proper tribute is being paid to the High King. However, his laborious scrutiny has uncovered some creative accounting…

incidents.localised_description: A Reckoner visits to inspect the Hold's books and ensure proper tribute is being paid to the High King. However, his laborious scrutiny has uncovered some creative accounting…

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of the oldest entries in this Dwarfhold's Book of Grudges has been struck out. A great feast is held to celebrate!

incidents.localised_description: One of the oldest entries in this Dwarfhold's Book of Grudges has been struck out. A great feast is held to celebrate!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Hold's brewery has run dry. For the Dawi, this is a disaster! The Brewmaster has already withdrawn in shame, and the Dwarfs have been forced to import weak, mannish brews in the interim. Morale is at an all-time low.

incidents.localised_description: The Hold's brewery has run dry. For the Dawi, this is a disaster! The Brewmaster has already withdrawn in shame, and the Dwarfs have been forced to import weak, mannish brews in the interim. Morale is at an all-time low.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Clan honour has been invoked! Tributes and Clans-Dwarfs must be gathered, some slight or greater grudge has been committed against the Clan and the offenders must pay!

incidents.localised_description: Clan honour has been invoked! Tributes and Clans-Dwarfs must be gathered, some slight or greater grudge has been committed against the Clan and the offenders must pay!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Clans are not happy - well, they never are - but they are particularly grumpy at the moment. Grumbling Clan Lords are meeting in moots and muttering about your reign.

incidents.localised_description: The Clans are not happy - well, they never are - but they are particularly grumpy at the moment. Grumbling Clan Lords are meeting in moots and muttering about your reign.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wanaz - Clanless Dwarfs - have come to the Hold hoping for sanctuary despite the shame such charity will bring upon their ancestors. A small lessening of our honour by accepting them is made up for with a boost to population numbers.

incidents.localised_description: Wanaz - Clanless Dwarfs - have come to the Hold hoping for sanctuary despite the shame such charity will bring upon their ancestors. A small lessening of our honour by accepting them is made up for with a boost to population numbers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Chaos Dragon is attacking the Hold. The cursed Drakk will eventually be fended off by the Dwarfhold's considerable defences, but not before substantial loss of Dawi life.

incidents.localised_description: A Chaos Dragon is attacking the Hold. The cursed Drakk will eventually be fended off by the Dwarfhold's considerable defences, but not before substantial loss of Dawi life.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The kvinn (Khazalid for lady) population of the Hold have denounced the quality of male stock from which to choose a husband. As a result, the majority of maidens have left in search of fresh beards.

incidents.localised_description: The kvinn (Khazalid for lady) population of the Hold have denounced the quality of male stock from which to choose a husband. As a result, the majority of maidens have left in search of fresh beards.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A seam of star metal, that rarest and most sought-after of all elements - Gromril - has been discovered close to the Dwarfhold. Refining it will bring prestige and great wealth.

incidents.localised_description: A seam of star metal, that rarest and most sought-after of all elements - Gromril - has been discovered close to the Dwarfhold. Refining it will bring prestige and great wealth.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The powerful Engineers' Guild has sent one of their top tinkerers to inspect this Hold's workshops after hearing concerning rumours of "innovation". On his arrival he is so impressed with the work done he decides to stay.

incidents.localised_description: The powerful Engineers' Guild has sent one of their top tinkerers to inspect this Hold's workshops after hearing concerning rumours of "innovation". On his arrival he is so impressed with the work done he decides to stay.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Guilds - fractious and intransigent institutions - have, for once, aligned with each other and are in full support of your rule. Trade will surely prosper!

incidents.localised_description: The Guilds - fractious and intransigent institutions - have, for once, aligned with each other and are in full support of your rule. Trade will surely prosper!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A part of the Dwarfhold, a lost area under the clutches of urks for many years, has been reclaimed. The Clans are already setting up undertakings in the new areas.

incidents.localised_description: A part of the Dwarfhold, a lost area under the clutches of urks for many years, has been reclaimed. The Clans are already setting up undertakings in the new areas.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Amidst the banging of tankards on the feasting tables, and raucous cheers and ribald chants, a storied hero of the Hold is risen up to the rank of Thane.

incidents.localised_description: Amidst the banging of tankards on the feasting tables, and raucous cheers and ribald chants, a storied hero of the Hold is risen up to the rank of Thane.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Rik has sealed the Dwarfhold - the great bar lays across its mountain doors and in the deeps the iron gates have come crashing down, severing the Underway. Why the Lord would do this is as yet a mystery!

incidents.localised_description: The Rik has sealed the Dwarfhold - the great bar lays across its mountain doors and in the deeps the iron gates have come crashing down, severing the Underway. Why the Lord would do this is as yet a mystery!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Karak's landing pads and Gyrocopter fleet have been destroyed in a daring operation! The damned urks! It will be sometime before the aircorps can be restored.

incidents.localised_description: The Karak's landing pads and Gyrocopter fleet have been destroyed in a daring operation! The damned urks! It will be sometime before the aircorps can be restored.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Hold's Slayers are summoned to Karak Kadrin to worship at the foot of Grimnir's Statue and then onto a great pilgrimage to seek out their death. To try and stop it risks forcing them to break their oath - no Dwarf would ever consider that!

incidents.localised_description: The Hold's Slayers are summoned to Karak Kadrin to worship at the foot of Grimnir's Statue and then onto a great pilgrimage to seek out their death. To try and stop it risks forcing them to break their oath - no Dwarf would ever consider that!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Miners would dig to the core of the world if they could, but this time they may have tunnelled too far, bore too deep into the roots of the mountain, for something stirs, something dreadful…

incidents.localised_description: The Miners would dig to the core of the world if they could, but this time they may have tunnelled too far, bore too deep into the roots of the mountain, for something stirs, something dreadful…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ancient underground foes attack! They must be stopped or we risk losing another stronghold to their vile encroachment.

incidents.localised_description: Ancient underground foes attack! They must be stopped or we risk losing another stronghold to their vile encroachment.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A close ally of yours has been shamed - a record has been unearthed concerning his ancestor reneging on an oath. The sins of past generations must be answered by the living, and so he has given up his wealth and status to take the Slayer Oath.

incidents.localised_description: A close ally of yours has been shamed - a record has been unearthed concerning his ancestor reneging on an oath. The sins of past generations must be answered by the living, and so he has given up his wealth and status to take the Slayer Oath.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Repairs to a crucial part of the Underway have been completed, but at a great cost to the Hold's treasury. It is a price worth paying, as the Underway is key to the resurgence of the Karaz Ankor.

incidents.localised_description: Repairs to a crucial part of the Underway have been completed, but at a great cost to the Hold's treasury. It is a price worth paying, as the Underway is key to the resurgence of the Karaz Ankor.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Upon completion of his 200 years service as an apprentice to a Runelord, a Runesmith has left his master, enquired about the sacred forges in the Hold and whether he could have the honour of lighting them again.

incidents.localised_description: Upon completion of his 200 years service as an apprentice to a Runelord, a Runesmith has left his master, enquired about the sacred forges in the Hold and whether he could have the honour of lighting them again.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Dwarf Engineer and his surroundings have been immolated as he was experimenting with the potency of blackpowder. Underground fires are something the Dawi are used to dealing with, although significant damage was still sustained.

incidents.localised_description: A Dwarf Engineer and his surroundings have been immolated as he was experimenting with the potency of blackpowder. Underground fires are something the Dawi are used to dealing with, although significant damage was still sustained.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Graf who holds sway over this region is offended that the Emperor did not invite him to the grand feast of Sigmarzeit. Diplomacy with them will be a little rocky for a while.

incidents.localised_description: The Graf who holds sway over this region is offended that the Emperor did not invite him to the grand feast of Sigmarzeit. Diplomacy with them will be a little rocky for a while.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The military complex of the Empire is a strange beast with no centralised standing army. The Grafs and Electors control their own men but even so, their Captains may favour one leader over another as in the case of this Captain publically supporting you.

incidents.localised_description: The military complex of the Empire is a strange beast with no centralised standing army. The Grafs and Electors control their own men but even so, their Captains may favour one leader over another as in the case of this Captain publically supporting you.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It has long been rumoured that Stirland's proximity to Sylvania means its courts are susceptible to Vampire infiltration. Our spies suspect such an occurrence, for Stirland is being aggressive to us. The influence of the von Carsteins is surely to blame.

incidents.localised_description: It has long been rumoured that Stirland's proximity to Sylvania means its courts are susceptible to Vampire infiltration. Our spies suspect such an occurrence, for Stirland is being aggressive to us. The influence of the von Carsteins is surely to blame.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Twin-Tailed Comet arcs across the sky, a portent of great events. The Grand Theogonist has decreed this to be a good omen. Your warriors are elated that Sigmar looks upon them, and gird themselves for war.

incidents.localised_description: The Twin-Tailed Comet arcs across the sky, a portent of great events. The Grand Theogonist has decreed this to be a good omen. Your warriors are elated that Sigmar looks upon them, and gird themselves for war.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Twin-Tailed Comet arcs across the sky, a portent of great events. The Grand Theogonist has decreed this to be an ill omen. The comet is a warning that dire events are about to unfold, so your warriors are shaken and wary.

incidents.localised_description: The Twin-Tailed Comet arcs across the sky, a portent of great events. The Grand Theogonist has decreed this to be an ill omen. The comet is a warning that dire events are about to unfold, so your warriors are shaken and wary.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Blackpowder should be kept dry and away from open flames until used in cannons and such. Of course, it needs to be stored somewhere, just as long as no careless fool walks into the store with a torch or lantern…

incidents.localised_description: Blackpowder should be kept dry and away from open flames until used in cannons and such. Of course, it needs to be stored somewhere, just as long as no careless fool walks into the store with a torch or lantern…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The seeds of Heresy is suspected in one of our settlements. The Grand Theogonist has released a Witch Hunter and charged him to root out the Chaos taint!

incidents.localised_description: The seeds of Heresy is suspected in one of our settlements. The Grand Theogonist has released a Witch Hunter and charged him to root out the Chaos taint!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A previously hostile Elector Count is ready to sue for peace. The Electors are political animals, so it is doubtful this gesture is motivated by selfless reasons, more likely another agenda is at play.

incidents.localised_description: A previously hostile Elector Count is ready to sue for peace. The Electors are political animals, so it is doubtful this gesture is motivated by selfless reasons, more likely another agenda is at play.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The appetites of the Halflings are legendary, but now they have nothing left to fill their hotpots. Hisme Stoutheart, Elder of the Moot, is demanding food be shipped in: "We'll make cutbacks, so we only need enough for three courses per meal."

incidents.localised_description: The appetites of the Halflings are legendary, but now they have nothing left to fill their hotpots. Hisme Stoutheart, Elder of the Moot, is demanding food be shipped in: "We'll make cutbacks, so we only need enough for three courses per meal."

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have the backing of the Cult of Sigmar. The Warrior Priests preach in the temples and on the battlefields of your divine right to the throne, and so flock to your banner.

incidents.localised_description: You have the backing of the Cult of Sigmar. The Warrior Priests preach in the temples and on the battlefields of your divine right to the throne, and so flock to your banner.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This local noble has always held a deep dislike of Karl Franz, ever since they courted the same girl a few years back. Needless to say, the Prince of Altdorf won the maiden's heart, further hardening the rival's hatred.

incidents.localised_description: This local noble has always held a deep dislike of Karl Franz, ever since they courted the same girl a few years back. Needless to say, the Prince of Altdorf won the maiden's heart, further hardening the rival's hatred.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The smallfolk have barricaded themselves in their homes, for this is the dread night of mysteries - when both moons are seen in the night sky and the dead awake to drag the living to hell…

incidents.localised_description: The smallfolk have barricaded themselves in their homes, for this is the dread night of mysteries - when both moons are seen in the night sky and the dead awake to drag the living to hell…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The rumour-smiths tell us that, in the court and along the verandas of Altdorf, our 'loyal' nobles plot your downfall. Better to nip this in the bud before malfeasance blossoms.

incidents.localised_description: The rumour-smiths tell us that, in the court and along the verandas of Altdorf, our 'loyal' nobles plot your downfall. Better to nip this in the bud before malfeasance blossoms.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ogres from the eastern kingdoms have come on the pretense of looking for work, but instead are causing quite a lot of bother, damage, and have eaten a few of the Watch as well…

incidents.localised_description: Ogres from the eastern kingdoms have come on the pretense of looking for work, but instead are causing quite a lot of bother, damage, and have eaten a few of the Watch as well…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Count Hertwig of Ostermark has declared his province free of the 'Emperor's Yoke'. Ostermark is now an independent nation, the Elector Count has announced. Apparently, envoys are already in the courts of Bretonnia and Marienburg. Do not rule out the politicking of the Burgomeisters in this. If so, they must be punished!

incidents.localised_description: Count Hertwig of Ostermark has declared his province free of the 'Emperor's Yoke'. Ostermark is now an independent nation, the Elector Count has announced. Apparently, envoys are already in the courts of Bretonnia and Marienburg. Do not rule out the politicking of the Burgomeisters in this. If so, they must be punished!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A large gathering of Flagellants combined with the usual rabble-rousers and malcontents have inflamed a riot. This will need halting or it may spread to other settlements.

incidents.localised_description: A large gathering of Flagellants combined with the usual rabble-rousers and malcontents have inflamed a riot. This will need halting or it may spread to other settlements.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A retired physician has been discovered to be a practising Necromancer. It seems the corpses he used to collect were for more than simply anatomical study! He must be stopped before he summons forth further minions!

incidents.localised_description: A retired physician has been discovered to be a practising Necromancer. It seems the corpses he used to collect were for more than simply anatomical study! He must be stopped before he summons forth further minions!
